Posts.Content: Hi I had a lumpectomy and 3 lymph nodes out on the 24 nov , but when results came back had cancer in one , so last Friday 15 dec I had a complete lymph node clearance, was a longer surgery but again I felt ok had full movement of my arm , no drain, under my arm and back of arm is numb but that was expected, a strange feeling of dripping in my arm, but not pain , was back in clinic yesterday and did have to have fluid drained I ended up having 22 nodes out but all clear, saw oncologist today and come in 2% of the margin for chemo so with the help of the oncologist have desided not on chemo , he started my hormone therapy today and see another oncologist on 12 jan to arrange my radiotherapy, id advice do your arm exercises and keep positive, listen to your body, I do feel a lot more tiered after this surgery, good luck and let us know how you get on xx hope this helps you xx
Posts.Title: Axillary Node Clearence

Posts.Content: Hi , I had a lumpectomy on the 24 nov with 3 lymph nodes removed, on results I had cancer cells in one of the 3 nodes, I was told I would need a complete node clearance which I had done on the 15 dec . I must admit a longer harder operation longer recovery I felt very tiered after this one , I was signed off work for 6 weeks but have just gone back after 3 weeks on light duties, reduced hours, I have seen an oncologist where I was told I dont really need chemo , I had 22  nodes plus the original 3 removed with only the one having cancer,, I am on hormone therapy tablets and seeing oncologist again on friday to arrange my radiotherapy, after this surgery I ended up with swelling around the wound area I had this drained in clinic but it came straight back , and is now just about gone on its own occord, numb in arm pit and sensitive on the top half of the arm now but I think this is the nerves knitting togeather hoping this will get better , all in all im happier the lymph nodes are gone as I think id always be worrying that more had had the cancer , hope this helps you xxxx
Posts.Title: Axillary Node Clearence

Posts.Content: I finished radiotherapy on the 2 march after 15 session , my boob is now smaller than the other one, did feel tight but the tightness has gone , it's not really bothering me but just wondering if anyone else has had the same  , and does it stay like this xx
Posts.Title: One smaller boob after radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Thank you mazza10 yes glad to know I'm not the only one , I pretty sure it's not noticeable with and bra and cloths ,so far it doesn't really bother me just hope it doesn't get any smaller , Mandi xx
Posts.Title: One smaller boob after radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Good luck , no how your feeling my first one is Monday xxx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I had zap 8 today , all going well , I use sure deodorant on both arms as was told that would be ok , and so far no problems, I use aveeno and again so far no skin problems, had a bad bout of sickness Mon/Tuesday but was told not a side effect probably a 24 hour bug cought as immune system low and had in worst form as couldn't fight it , but back to normal today, hope everyone is having a good day much love Mandi xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: IV now had to zaps and so far so good  the only thing I can say which may sound very weird is my zapped boob is looking smaller , I'm trying to work through this so far that's ok too , hope everyone  else is doing good and good luck to everyone that's starting this week xxx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi all , I had a lumpectomy in November and full lymph nodes clearance 15  Dec , I start my radiotherapy on the 12 Feb , have been taking letrozole for a month , now haven't really had any problems with operations , and only really hot sweats with the letrozole, so really hope radiotherapy follows the same well , good luck to everyone xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi debbie which London hospital are you having your treatment in , I would have had to go to guys , but they opened a new Macmillan center in my local hospital in September , so I'm so lucky I'll be having my radiotherapy in my local hospital in Sidcup  good luck Mandi x
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Debbie , were do you live shame you still have to get the train that's what  i was dreading if they gave me guys , yes I'm going to be working while have my zaps, my times are all different  earliest 12.30 I think to one being at five , I'm going to work before  have zap and then go home and rest well that's the theory any way lol , Mandi xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Oh no  JAC what will they do now , I feel mine has shrunk but today was zap 3 and they have not said anything so hope it's not going to course a problem , good luck with getting back on track xxx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi Debbie yes I start mine on the 12th for three weeks , I know what you mean about wanting it finished so you can get on with life , I'm so pleased I don't have to go to guys , do you have to travel far  hugs Mandi xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Leigh hope it's not to stressful working while on the rads, I'm on letrozole  have been on them for a month now , side effects mainly hot sweats but if that's all I get I class myself lucky , oncologist did say side effects should settle after two months , so we will see good luck Mandi xx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: So tomorrow is my first day of 3 weeks of radiotherapy, I'm hopefully going to be working while I have this , am atuallac quite excited , weird I know but I see it as getting to the end of my journey apart from taking the letrozole for 5 years lol  ,
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hi Julie I had a sickness bug Mon/Tue still went for radiotherapy on Tuesday feeling quite ill , but they told me was better to still come and have the treatment if possible, there are a lot of bugs going around they told me  xxx
